required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of BCD-135 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter Open-Label Single-Arm Multi-Cohort Phase I Study of Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Immunogenicity of BCD-135 (JSC BIOCAD, Russia) in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: A Multicenter Open-Label Single-Arm Multi-Cohort Phase I Study of Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Immunogenicity of BCD-135 (JSC BIOCAD, Russia) in Patients with Advanced Solid Tumors

primary_outcome.description: Disease control rate (CR+PR+SD). Pilot efficacy assessment is not the primary objective of this study and will be conducted by surrogate endpoints describing the direct antitumor effect of the drug.
